mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( n_number, n_title, n_content ) VALUES ( notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{n_title}, #{n_content} )
mapper.select: SELECT n_number, n_title, n_content, n_date FROM notice WHERE n_number > 0 ORDER BY n_number DESC, n_date DESC
SELECT n_number, n_title, n_content, n_date FROM notice WHERE n_number = #{n_number}
